title: Looking to play League at a serious level, don't know where to start!!!

embed.description: st1nky / Platinum 1 100LP / 138W 111L Win Ratio 55% / Lucian - 22W 15L Win Ratio 59%, Vayne - 17W 15L Win Ratio 53%, Draven - 8W 7L Win Ratio 53%, Ezreal - 7W 5L Win Ratio 58%, Ahri - 2W 9L Win Ratio 18%

body: I am currently plat 1 promos to diamond, want to make it to the big leagues

replies.body:
You should focus on your own play, improving and reaching Master and Challenger. Getting to diamond isn't a big deal... And also, for the "big leagues", you can't be a 1-trick pony (not saying you are), you must have somewhat of a large champion pool, for the role you want to play in. Only then, you should consider playing in the big leagues.

If you don't like this, fine. It's just my opinion.
Yeah, I know. I just don't know how to promote myself. I actually don't know what websites there are to look for a team hehe, but thanks for your opinion!!! What rank are you?
pits  of hell, to bronze, to gold to streaming
